news.title: The biggest questions facing Big Tech ahead of earnings
news.summary: All of the megacap companies have significant exposure to President Donald Trump's sweeping tariffs, which will be a major topic on earnings calls.

news.title: Pope Francis, the first pontiff from the Americas, dies at 88
news.summary: "With deep sorrow I must announce the death of our Holy Father Francis," Cardinal Kevin Farrell says in a video address. "Dearest brothers and sisters, with deep sorrow," he says.

news.title: China vows retaliation against countries that follow U.S. calls to isolate Beijing
news.summary: China retaliated against U.S. tariffs with levies of 125% on imports of American goods. In a shift toward a harder stance this month, China has taken a tougher stance against the United States.

news.title: Trump's approval rating on the economy drops to lowest of his presidential career, CNBC Survey finds
news.summary: President Donald Trump registering the worst economic approval numbers of his presidential career, according to the latest CNBC All-America Economic Survey. Trump's approval numbers are at the lowest level of his presidency.

news.title: 'A man of the people': World leaders react to the death of Pope Francis
news.summary: Tributes and condolences poured in from around the world following news of the death of Pope Francis. Pope Francis died on Monday at the age of 88.

news.title: Overly bearish investors risk writing off 2025 too soon. These strategies offer upside and downside protection.
news.summary: Ed Yardeni argues that, to match the doom and gloom from Wall Street bears, the stock market would need to see a Lehman-esque meltdown.

news.title: Netflix wants to be a $1 trillion company. Earnings show why that’s a reasonable goal.
news.summary: Analysts see Netflix generating growth even in a recession. Analysts expect Netflix to continue to grow even if the U.S. economy is in recession.

news.title: ‘My house and car are paid off’: I have $1 million in stocks — so where do I invest $100,000?
news.summary: “I have plenty of rainy-day money. I don’t want to be a landlord again. And, yes, I give my children money.”

news.title: This economist says there’s a 90% chance of a recession. Here’s the math.
news.summary: A voluntary trade reset recession doesn’t sound very good, and it’s not. A voluntary tradereset recession doesn't sound like a good idea.

news.title: ‘She’s kept him afloat’: I’m 78 and leaving my daughter my life savings, but her partner is unemployed and doesn’t pay rent. What do I do?
news.summary: “He keeps losing jobs and going on unemployment,” he says. “He’s got to do something.”
